thread.section_title: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski | eriksbikeshop.com | 3 of 51
thread.title: Steve
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text: I bought a board for my son on a Monday to get it by the weekend. Erik's emailed me that it may not be in stock and take an extra day or two. After explaining I needed it by the weekend, they made it a point to find one and ship it out promptly. Will be back for more gear. Thank you.
